root.name: Majyuuou
root.description: OverviewMajyuuou is an action platformer developed and published by KSS for the Super Famicom in 1995. Majyuuou is one of the most famous titles released by the anime production company, KSS, during its decade in the games industry.Majyuuou was never official released outside of Japan but Aeon Genesis did release an English patch for the game on February 14, 2003 and translated the title to "King of Demons."
